actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to make permanent the provision in the Social Security Act for providing assistance for U.S. citizens returned from foreign countries.

summary.text: Makes permanent the provision in the Social Security Act for providing assistance for United States citizens returned from foreign countries. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1313(d))

titles.title: A bill to make permanent the provision in the Social Security Act for providing assistance for U.S. citizens returned from foreign countries.
